entry.title: Welcome to St2Py
entry.content:
Welcome to St2Py! St2Py is a team that focus on Network Security. Now, we have two main projects, BitCrypt and SecProxy.

BitCrypt Project

BitCrypt is an open source army level file encryption/decryption software. It’s easy to install and use, supports Linux, Windows, OSX, FreeBSD four main operating systems. Welcom everyone to use it, and give us advise.

SecProxy Project

SecProxy is an open source secure proxy software to ensure network communication security. It also uses the army level encryption technologies. Welcom everyone to use it, and give us advise.

Contact Us

Welcom everyone to join the development team, for more details please refer to Contact Page.

Donation

For donation details, please refer to Donation Page.

中文站点

访问中文站点，请移步 http://blog.st2py.com/cn/
